content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **northward** - by tin can knits -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- *simple chunky cables make the perfect hat to keep noggins warm in the long northern winter * -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **like our knits ** get our email updates 3 to hear about new designs tutorials and subscriber-only special offers -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** ============ **sizing ** baby child **adult s/m adult l** fits head 14 17 **20 23** inches around **yarn** 70 80 100 120 yds bulky weight yarn * samples in brooklyn tweed quarry in citrine and lazulite and brooklyn tweed shelter held doubled in cinnabar and tartan * **needles ** us #9 / 5 5mm 16 circular and us #10 5 / 6 5mm 16 circular and dpns baby size worked entirely on dpns or as required to meet gauge **gauge ** 14 sts & 20 rounds / 4 in stockinette on larger needles **notions ** stitch marker cable needle darning needle pom pom maker optional -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 6 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/max--bodhis-wardrobe 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/max--bodhis-wardrobe 3 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 4 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/rainbow-heirloom-sweater 5 http //www ravelry com/yarns/library/the-uncommon-thread-merino-dk 6 www tincanknits com
